title: Alan Sisto & Shawn Marchese (Prancing Pony Podcast) Livestream Interview
description: We welcome the hosts of The Prancing Pony Podcast - one of the most popular Tolkien-related podcasts - Alan Sisto & Shawn Marchese.   You can listen to the The Prancing Pony Podcast wherever you get your podcasts.  Alan & Shawn recently celebrated the 5th Anniversary of starting the PPP, which won the 2020 Tolkien Society Award for Best Online Content.
